previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Real Salt Lake | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 1, Real Salt Lake 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy and Real Salt Lake renew their rivalry for the third time this season when the Western Conference clubs meet in a key match Saturday evening at StubHub Center
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: LA Galaxy vs Real Salt Lake | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: galacticla
timelineItems.text: Beautiful day for an #LAGalaxy  game!

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Kyle Beckerman tries a through ball, but John Stertzer is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: #RSL doing their thing with possession, #LAGalaxy having trouble winning the ball and doing something with it. #LAvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tommy Meyer (LA Galaxy).
Attempt missed. John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Joao Plata with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Marvin Santos
timelineItems.text: Rodgers looking better at that lb position #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 12' Stertzer puts first decent chance of the night high and away. Nice over-the-top ball by Plata. Stertzer should've put it on goal. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Nat Borchers.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: RSL dispossess LA in the midfield sparking counterattack but Stertzer sends his chance over the bar. LA earn a corner on the other end

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Nick Rimando following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Jackie❤️
timelineItems.text: Real Salt Lake vs. LA Galaxy. ⚽️��� #lagalaxy #stubhubcenter

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Gyasi Zardes tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Route 1 for RSL is going to be finding Plata in space by any means necessary. Trying to use his speed to create space in the LA back 4

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Offside. That’s not going to count. I can’t see the TV monitor but Robbie Keane looked offside. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake).
A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Flag Up. Offside called on Keane negates a goal by Sarvas. Looked to be the right call for sure. #LAvRSL

timelineItems.name: alexbrayman
timelineItems.text: #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: The Fucking Reserves
timelineItems.text: Holy cow, could @KyleBeckerman look any better? His World Cup exp. has benefited him big time #greatness #RSL #giantsteps

timelineItems.name: Real Sports Live
timelineItems.text: Someone should send that clip of Nat conceding a corner but clearing a dangerous ball with his head to David Luiz. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Luke Rosemann
timelineItems.text: I like Sandoval but this is not his season. #RSL #rslvsla

timelineItems.name: Liz Cuesta lizzy loeb
timelineItems.text: My first #boxsuite #lagalaxy #missingthemoment #missedthebestpart

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luis Gil with a cross.

timelineItems.name: lisaleigh23
timelineItems.text: #LAgalaxy #donovan #10 #corner #soccer #jul122014

timelineItems.name: Sandra Fernández
timelineItems.text: #LAGALAXY

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Real Salt Lake 0. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gyasi Zardes sneaks one through RSL and past Rimando

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers already putting in some work against @RealSaltLake’s Sandoval. Some good work from RR. He’ll be tested tonight. #LAGalaxy #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Donovan again in the center of the park means that at times you'll see Zardes alone up top due to all of the dropping back that Keane does.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 2' Joao Plata looks to be in some discomfort. Tommy Meyer dispossessed Plata about a minute in. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Morales is down #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, LA Galaxy 1, Real Salt Lake 0.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: FT - 1-0. The #LAGalaxy get their grit on (is that phrase?) with a solid victory against Salt @RealSaltLake. Zardes gets the goal. #LAvRSL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pecoraro
timelineItems.text: Rimando with the kind of spectacular save he's made kind of commonplace, but unfortunately he's the best guy #RSL had on the pitch in 2nd

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: PENALTY SAVE! @NickRimando stonewalls Marcelo Sarvas. #LAvRSL

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Gonzales
timelineItems.text: Yeah.. so can @landondonovan volunteer as tribute and take our penalty kicks again? @LAGalaxy #LAvRSL #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Kali K.
timelineItems.text: I wonder if #RSL will ever score from the run of play again... *sigh*

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: 1-0 @LAGalaxy over @RealSaltLake. The home side runs their undefeated streak to seven games. http://t.co/ONNiDG9Ic9 #LAvRSL

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy and Real Salt Lake renew their rivalry for the third time this season when the Western Conference clubs meet in a key match Saturday evening at StubHub Center
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs Real Salt Lake | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #LAGALAXY GOAL! Gyasi Zardes! Great little break started with Morales on the ground. Zardes fed and bounces one off the post and in.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: The ball was touched my Rimando but bounced off the post and in #RSL

timelineItems.desc: LA Galaxy combine to create a chance but Chris Schuler blocks the shot.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Galaxy can't get the final touch past the RSL defense

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 21' L.A. up 1-0. Morales has some words for Donovan who started counter that led to the goal. Sloppy man-marking from #RSL.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Zzzzzzzzzardes. He's electric! @LAGalaxy on top of @RealSaltLake 1-0. #LAvRSL

timelineItems.name: Kacy Hill
timelineItems.text: Ugh!! If Javi would quit laying down for the match we could play with full team! #SoooFrustrating #RSL #RSLTID #RSLfam

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes.

timelineItems.name: Jake Hatch
timelineItems.text: That goal is on #RSL being lazy. Javi was down but you still have to track back and mark your man. Nicely taken goal for Zardes.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 22' L.A. nearly doubles. Keane with a great cross and Zardes barely misses on the other end. Galaxy stretching #RSL right now.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Juninho (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Real Sports Live
timelineItems.text: Should be 2-0. Zardes misses an open net. Tons of space for LA on the last 2 counters. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Landen Hardy
timelineItems.text: Where has or back line gone? #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Schuller made a good move getting his foot on the ball to stop the second shot. First shot attempt was luckily whiffed #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: It's becoming more and more evident just how much RSL misses Saborio. Attack so often looks stagnant. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Juninho down after that play. Kenny walker off the bench warming up. But it looks like Juni is fine. He’s back on the field. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: kaishakunin86
timelineItems.text: A beautiful day for soccer! #mls #lagalaxy  #sunset #losangeles #lagalaxy #donovan #keane

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Now it’s about effort and concentration. This team has lacked that in the past weeks. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Oof. Zardes never forgets to remind you that he's arguably the most frustrating player in #MLS. #LAGalaxy #LAvRSL

timelineItems.text: Good to be back at the park with @LAGalaxy #lagalaxy http://t.co/Oj1WSBxSTH

timelineItems.text: If the #LAGalaxy are going to win an #MLSCup this season with this roster, it's going to be because Gyasi Zardes is scoring goals not RK/LD.
